querylist.query: select fid,file_name,file_save,file_path,file_ext,file_size,to_char(a_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') a_date from sample_file <if:excel> where file_ext in ('xls','xlsx') </if:excel> <if:image> where file_ext in ('jpg','gif','png','zip') </if:image> order by a_date desc
select fid,file_name,file_save,file_path,file_ext,file_size,to_char(a_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') a_date from sample_file where fid=:fid
